trashday.storage

Class DynamoDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • trashday.storage.DynamoDao

  • public class DynamoDao
extends Object
    Trash Day data access object for DynamoDB.
    Author:
    J. Todd Baldwin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      DynamoDao(DynamoItemPersistence dynamoItemPersistence)
      Create database access object

    • Constructor Detail

      • DynamoDao

        public DynamoDao(DynamoItemPersistence dynamoItemPersistence)
        Create database access object
        Parameters:
        dynamoItemPersistence - TrashDayDynamoDbClient to use for saving and loading user information.

    • Method Detail

      • appendIntentLogData

        public void appendIntentLogData(SessionDao sessionDao,
                                IntentLog intentLog)
        Appends given user intent log data into this user's Dynamo DB entry log data.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao data access object for user data stored in current Session.
        intentLog - IntentLog Log information to be appended into the user's database entry

      • readUserData

        public boolean readUserData(SessionDao sessionDao)
        Reads user data from Dynamo DB and stores in the SessionDao. Uses SessionDao.getUserId() to read the correct database table item for this particular user. Loaded data is stored in the user's session data via the SessionDao.

        Returns null if the user's item could not be found in the database.

        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao data access object for user data stored in current Session.
        Returns:
        true if a database item was found and read for this user

      • writeUserData

        public void writeUserData(SessionDao sessionDao)
        Saves user data from the SessionDao into the Dynamo DB. Does NOT write intent log information. Does NOT write Schedule information as that is deprecated and Calendar is used instead.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao data access object for user data stored in current Session.

      • eraseUserData

        public void eraseUserData(SessionDao sessionDao)
        Delete all user data when the clear their entire schedule.
        Parameters:
        sessionDao - SessionDao data access object for user data stored in current Session.
